item.title: 显示HN：提供LLMS时间意识和时间计算的MCP服务器
item.description:
这是一个开放式模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器，它使任何LLM都能对时间的流逝感。 That’s useful, but MCP is also a chance to give models perception — extra senses beyond the prompt text.Six functions (`current_datetime`, `time_difference`, `timestamp_context`, etc.) give Claude/GPT real temporal awareness: It can spot pauses, reason about rhythms, and even label a chat’s “three‑act structure”.在<60 s（python）或通过托管演示中进行本地运行。如果时间有效，我们还能表现出什么？ - Location / movement (GPS, speed, “I’m on a train”) - Weather (rainy evening vs clear morning) - Device state (battery low, poor bandwidth) - Ambient modality (user is dictating on mobile vs typing at desk) - Calendar context (meeting starts in 5 min) - Biometric cues (heart‑rate spikes while coding)Curious what other signals people think would unlock better collaboration.Full back story: nofollow> https> https> https：//medium.com/@jer@jer@jeremie.lumbroso/toedre>模式，工具发现或未来的“感官”。反馈和PR欢迎！
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=44583014 点：47 ＃评论：30
